item.title: Installing Docker in Ubuntu 20.10 (Groovy Gorilla)
item.author: Author
item.description:
Hello everyone,

Recently I installed the latest non LTS version of Ubuntu 20.10 Groovy Gorilla, and found it a bit of a hassle to install Docker with this, following the repository tutorial step.

item.title: Hello World
item.author: Author
item.description:
Hello world!

This is my first post on my new created blog.

I’m a Software Engineer that moved countries in a mist of a pandemic. Here i share my ideas, projects and interests. To celebrate i leave my favorite game of all time as a easter egg.
